Articles.Content:
oops thats a trap in fact: ( ; )

They Has Kerbalistically Spoken.

He can't be wrong look at his eyes ; )
I don't understand this thread. Is this a thread devoted entirely to you requesting KAC be made stock?
A bunch of those windows are MJ.
tbh KAC and all its features should be stock.

Here I thought it was another "thanks squad" thread, while at the same time ruing the fact KAC isn't stock, when BANG out of nowhere you threw a curveball at me and it really is a "Make KAC stock" thread.

Lovely deception.

All warfare is based on deception.

All warfare is based on deception.

UNLESS ITS A FARM.

TF2 references aside, I've never played using KAC before. I'll probably end up getting it, growing completely dependent on it, then wondering how I ever was able to play KSP in the first place.

Edited May 15, 2015 by temporalExile

The picture and crappy pun with it just made me laugh by mega voluntary dumbness, really look like he his starring at it like an evidence. ; ) or may be it's redux overlay not sure xDr Might be some new kind of thks too anyway & also.

Edited May 15, 2015 by WinkAllKerb''
@ para not at all in definitive just thoose eyes are fun ; )

Count me in with the "KAC should be stocked" crowd. Add KER (or at least, a scaled down version) and Waypoint Manager as well.

Honorable mention to KAS/KIS.
Eh, if any mod should really be made stock, it's KER. KAC is a close second, but it's really a convenience. Anyways, both of these are easy enough to install, so I don't really see the problem.
